name: compatible
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: able to exist, live together, or work successfully with something or someone else
trans_examp.trans_cn: 可共存的；协调的；兼容的

example.eg: It was when we started living together that we found we just weren't compatible.
example.egtrans: 等到开始生活在一起时，才发现我们根本合不来。

example.eg: This software may not be compatible with older operating systems.
example.egtrans: 该软件可能与较老的操作系统不兼容。

example.eg: Such policies are not compatible with democratic government.
example.egtrans: 此类政策与民主政体格格不入。

example.eg: Are their two blood groups compatible (= can blood from one person be given to the other person)?
